ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: help with mage
ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks you all for your help in this matter.  It may be that the mage was my first character, or that it was on Rallos, or that after a few weeks of 26 I went
ygData.messageBody:
Thanks you all for your help in this matter. It may be that the mage was my first character, or that it was on Rallos, or that after a few weeks of 26 I went and started a Druid on a different server, but whatever it was, Im hoping that I can get her up to a higher level. I tell you what though, after playing my druid, a mage is VERY difficult. Then again, with a low level druid with kei almost anythnig else is difficult.
Kittin
